name: Vespertilio (Non-Explicit)
description:
Help Sebastian to solve a conspiracy involving the disappearance of his own brother.

♥♥Meanwhile, maybe find true love.♥♥

This version DOESN'T contain explicit content such direct violence or nudity

  • Deep History for each character - Can you solve mysteries of the past?
  • Romance and Horror - Love her, not matter what
  • Low System Requirements - Play soft and enjoy retro graphics vibe

Please, have in mind that this game still under construction, and your feedback is so much valuable! 

Bugs, help, suggestions, or just talk: Send an email to redpinescorp@gmail.com or find me on Twitter https://twitter.com/CorpPines
